CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​CommentTypes.​Manager
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Module
public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​CommentTypes.​Manager

A module to handle Comments.txt and all the comment type settings within Natural Docs.

Usage

  • Call Engine.Instance.Start() which will start this module.

Constants
KeySettingsForKeywords
public const KeySettings KeySettingsForKeywords
KeySettingsForCommentTypes
public const KeySettings KeySettingsForCommentTypes
KeySettingsForTags
public const KeySettings KeySettingsForTags
Functions
Manager
public Manager (
Engine.Instance engineInstance
)
Dispose
protected override void Dispose (
bool strictRulesApply
)
Start
public bool Start (
Errors.ErrorList errorList
)

Loads and combines the two versions of Comments.txt, returning whether it was successful.  If there were any errors they will be added to errorList.

Dependencies

  • Config.Manager must be started before this class can start.

Start_CreateType
private bool Start_CreateType (
ConfigFileCommentType configFileCommentType,
Path sourceFile,
bool isSystemFile,
Errors.ErrorList errorList
)

A helper function that is used only by Start() to create an entry in commentTypes for a ConfigFileCommentType.  Does not set any properties.  Returns whether it was able to do so without any errors.

Start_ApplyProperties
private bool Start_ApplyProperties (
ConfigFileCommentType configFileCommentType,
Path sourceFile,
StringSet ignoredKeywords,
Errors.ErrorList errorList
)

A helper function that is used only by Start() to combine a ConfigFileCommentType's properties into commentTypes and its keywords into singularKeywords and pluralKeywords.  Assumes entries were already created for all of them by Start_CreateType().  Returns whether it was able to do so without causing an error.

Start_FixCapitalization
public void Start_FixCapitalization (
List<ConfigFileCommentType> configFileCommentTypes
)

A helper function used only by Start() which cleans up the capitalization of ConfigFileCommentTypes such as by making Alter Comment Type and Index With entries match the original type.

Assumes commentTypes is already filled in and valid.

FromKeyword
public CommentType FromKeyword (
string keyword
)

Returns the CommentType associated with the passed keyword, or null if none.

FromKeyword
public CommentType FromKeyword (
string keyword,
out bool plural
)

Returns the CommentType associated with the passed keyword, or null if none.  Also returns whether it was singular or plural.

FromName
public CommentType FromName (
string name
)

Returns the CommentType associated with the passed name, or null if none.

FromID
public CommentType FromID (
int id
)

Returns the CommentType associated with the passed ID, or null if none.

IDFromKeyword
public int IDFromKeyword (
string keyword
)

Returns the comment type ID associated with the passed keyword, or zero if none.

TagFromName
public Tag TagFromName (
string name
)

Returns the Tag associated with the passed name, or null if none.

TagFromID
public Tag TagFromID (
int id
)

Returns the Tag associated with the passed ID, or null if none.

Properties
GroupCommentTypeID
public int GroupCommentTypeID { get }

The ID of the "group" keyword, or zero if it isn't defined.

Variables
commentTypes
protected IDObjects.Manager<CommentType> commentTypes

Manages all the CommentTypes by their case-insensitive name or ID number.

tags
protected IDObjects.Manager<Tag> tags

Manages all the Tags by their case-insensitive name or ID number.

singularKeywords
protected StringTable<CommentType> singularKeywords

A StringTable mapping the singular keywords to the CommentTypes they represent.

pluralKeywords
protected StringTable<CommentType> pluralKeywords

A StringTable mapping the plural keywords to the CommentTypess they represent.

groupCommentTypeID
protected int groupCommentTypeID

The ID of the "group" keyword, or zero if it's not defined.
